description: Learn how to make a delicious cherry glaze for your Christmas ham. This recipe is easy to make and is infused with festive flavours. Try it today.
name: Cherry Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Increase heat to medium and bring to a simmer. Simmer for 5 minutes or until mixture has thickened slightly. Using a slotted spoon, transfer cherries to a bowl. Stand for 15 minutes to cool. Glaze ham and top ham with cherries in the last 5 minutes of ham cooking time.

Increase heat to medium and bring to a simmer. Simmer for 5 minutes or until mixture has thickened slightly. Using a slotted spoon, transfer cherries to a bowl. Stand for 15 minutes to cool. Glaze ham and top ham with cherries in the last 5 minutes of ham cooking time.
